# Welcome {.unnumbered}

Welcome to Open Source Typography by [Nan Xiao](https://nanx.me/).
This is an opinionated guide for discovering typefaces from a selected
collection of exquisite open source fonts for your next software or website
project. This lookbook showcases a variety of typefaces - from serif and
sans serif to display and small caps - that are not only visually stunning
but also reliable in design.
